DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety efficacy long-term use pregabalin dose 450 mg/day patient fibromyalgia complete 16 week dose Study A0081208 ( NCT00830167 ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Study To Evaluate Safety And Efficacy Of Pregabalin In Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Patients must meet inclusion criterion precede fibromyalgia Protocol A0081208 , must receive pregabalin/placebo doubleblind condition . Patients may participate study experience serious adverse event previous fibromyalgia Study A0081208 ; determine related study medication investigator sponsor .
